location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Alfred Cotton Way

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Way either taking the Hugh Roseto the Muscat coast or sending her there and then returning to Bassidore and thanking him for his careful and satisfactory management of affairs there.The letter goes on to state that altougth Bassidore should not be left entirely vacant it could perhaps be left for July and August provided one of the vessels visited there once or twice and asking him to make the necessary arrangements.
